Class Expense

Expense class is used to manage, store and access different properties of this object

Expense(Int32, DateTime, Int32, Double, String)

Constructor that iniializes the properties of this class according to the 5 parameters received.

Declaration
public Expense(int id, DateTime date, int category, double amount, string description)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 id

A unique id number of the expense
System.DateTime date

The date when the expense was made.
System.Int32 category

The category of the expense.
System.Double amount

The amount of money spent on this expense.
System.String description

A brief description (name) of the expense.
